entry.name: useCurrentDecoration
entry.label: use the system current decoration at all times. The decoration is updated accordingly when needed

entry.name: selectedPlugin
entry.label: user preferred decoration plugin to use

entry.name: selectedScheme
entry.label: user preferred color scheme to use with the selected plugin

entry.name: selectedTheme
entry.label: user preferred theme to use with the selected plugin

entry.name: visibility
entry.label: when the applet will be visible

entry.name: filterByScreen
entry.label: if false active window can be on any screen

entry.name: hiddenState
entry.label: when the applet should be hidden how it should behave

entry.name: inactiveStateEnabled
entry.label: draw buttons in inactive state when is needed

entry.name: useDecorationMetrics
entry.label: use the discovered decoration metrics in case there are any in order to look consistent with window titlebars

entry.name: buttonSizePercentage
entry.label: the buttons size relevant to panel thickness

entry.name: lengthFirstMargin
entry.label: first margin used to increase or decrease the icons distance from surrounding applets

entry.name: lengthLastMargin
entry.label: last margin used to increase or decrease the icons distance from surrounding applets

entry.name: lengthMarginsLock
entry.label: used only by the settings window in order to remember the user choice concerning the locker

entry.name: formFactor
entry.label: it is used in order to inform settings window about the plasmoid form factor. 2=Horizontal and 3=Vertical

entry.name: containmentType
entry.label: it helps to enable/disable options that are specific to plasma or Latte panels
